ValidationRule.description: Prevents the user from setting the status back to Initial after it has been set to Active or beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Initial'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(cgcloud__Status__c), 'Active') || ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(cgcloud__Status__c), 'On Hold') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change Status back to Initial
